summary: This document is an email chain from October 8, 2019, discussing the preparation and service of a subpoena to JP Morgan Chase by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York. The emails involve coordination between an Assistant U.S. Attorney, a Forensic Accountant, and a Special Agent regarding the subpoena's details and delivery.

persons.name: Mark
persons.context: Forensic Accountant with the FBI New York Field Office who is coordinating the preparation and return of a subpoena to JP Morgan Chase and providing contact instructions.

events.title: Subpoena Preparation for JP Morgan Chase
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney requests the preparation of a subpoena for JP Morgan Chase, attaching a rider and specifying service and contact instructions.

keyFacts: A subpoena was being prepared for JP Morgan Chase by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York on October 8, 2019.
The email chain shows internal coordination between an Assistant U.S. Attorney, a Forensic Accountant (Mark), and a Special Agent regarding the subpoena.
The subpoena results were to be forwarded electronically to a Special Agent at 26 Federal Plaza in New York.
The document references an attached rider for the subpoena, indicating specific records or information being sought from JP Morgan Chase.
